## Goals for Today

-   Minimal document → fix a common error
-   Title / author / date
-   Sections & subsections
-   Labels & references
-   Table of contents

## Minimal document (broken)

Use this to show a compile error and how to spot it.

``` latex
\documentclass[a4paper,12pt]{article}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\begin{document
(Type your content here.)
\end{document}
```

**What’s wrong?** Missing `}` in `\begin{document}`.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Minimal document (fixed)

``` latex
\documentclass[a4paper,12pt]{article}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\begin{document}
(Type your content here.)
\end{document}
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Title block (today’s date)

Place before your content, then `\maketitle`.

``` latex
\title{Phonology Paper}
\author{My Name}
\date{\today}
\maketitle
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Fixed date (not today)

``` latex
\date{December 6, 2017}
```

Use either `\today` or a fixed date—don’t do both.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Sections & subsections

``` latex
\section{Introduction}
This is the introduction.

\section{Methods}
\subsection{Stage 1}
First part of the methods.

\subsection{Stage 2}
Second part of the methods.
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Labels & references

``` latex
\section{Methods}
\subsection{Stage 1}
\label{sec1}
Text here.

\section{Results}
Referring to section~\ref{sec1}
on page~\pageref{sec1}.
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Table of contents

Place right after `\maketitle`.

``` latex
\pagenumbering{roman}
\tableofcontents
\newpage
\pagenumbering{arabic}
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------
